attributes.review: Do not download this app!! There is a major security flaw that allows the Chinese government to access users email addresses through the app and use it to steal users info! If you do not want your personal info stolen do not download this app!
attributes.title: Major flaw/ data breach!

attributes.review:
This is literally the worst app I have ever had the misfortune to may eyes on. Number 1: the very act of downloading it made me throw up five times number 2: it was slow and awful and overall badly made 3: I am emotionally traumatized. 
Do not download  if you value your mental well-being. This hurt me. Deeply.
attributes.title: ATROCIOUS

attributes.review: So I download the app and then I got a bunch of glitches in my phone like and I got hacked I lost everything I had to go through a lot to get it all back don’t download this app at all it’s the worst app ever I paid over $1000 to get everything back
attributes.title: Terrible app🤮🤮

attributes.review: This app is good at all. It doesn’t help all I don’t know why apple wanted this app to be up here but it needs to go. It doesn’t support all races and I don’t support it. We need to come together and do something about it take this app down now we don’t like it.

attributes.review: this app was HORRIBLE!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD! i came to see what all the hype was for after the boomers were yelling about it, but the whole thing mad my phone glitch so much! i’ve never had so much trouble with an app and i think my phone needs a whole software update!
attributes.title: bad vibes + 0/10

attributes.review: i got this app and it took so long to download and when it finally did download, my phone was glitching so badly i had to get a new phone. to really put the cherry on the cake, after i got this app, my camera made me look orange:( 10/10 do NOT recommend
attributes.title: this app is HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app took so long to download and when it finally did it said “ black lives matter!??”😡😡 “all country’s matter” i was so angry. what is going on ?!! the app also drained my battery and wasted all of my Data and storage. get this app of the app store 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: so disappointed

attributes.review: This app is horrible. ✨This app brought so many problems it was very hard to use, every time I was walking my caterpillar it would just blast music ✨ it is just a terrible app would not recommend -5/10 never downloading again.❤️🧡💛💚💙💜

attributes.review: This is the worse I have ever downloaded. It gives fake news and information. I might as well get on Twitter and keep up with the “accurate” information y’all orange president gives. 0/10 would not recommend.
